TopicTitle: Returning player looking for mod suggestions.

Articles.Content:
I last played KSP about 10 years ago, but I recently felt the urge to get back into it (largely after hearing how KSP 2 is basically cancelled).
Although it's been a long time, I still know the game well enough that I feel like doing a pretty modded play through.
Since I've been out of the loop for so long, can anyone suggest any mods (be it visuals, parts, planets etc.) that are worth using?

And another thing, is it safe to assume that mods that are versioned to 1.12 are still working?
